title: Round Robin Template-test bulk upload
excerpt: This template guides you through a collaborative session where every team member contributes multiple ideas, making it great for brainstorming and exploration.
content: This round robin template, built by LUMA Institute, guides you through a collaborative session where every team member contributes multiple ideas, making it great for brainstorming and exploration. Use this template to generate and iterate on ideas across your whole team./nWith the round robin approach, team members are not only encouraged to think of original solutions to problems, but also build upon the ideas of other participants, helping add context and refine your brainstorming.
